languages.text: "Но когда его подменили? До того момента он был таким же как обычно, шутил, улыбался. Вдруг я мог его спасти..."
"But when did it happen? Right up to that moment, he was his usual self, joking and smiling. What if there was something I could've done? Something to save him..."
languages.original_text: "Но когда его подменили? До того момента он был таким же как обычно, шутил, улыбался. Вдруг я мог его спасти..."

traits.locale_text: "But when did it happen? Right up until that moment, he was the same as always. Joking, smiling. What if there was something I could've done? To save him..."
"But when did it happen? Right up until that moment, he was the same as always. Joking, smiling. What if there was something I could've done? To save him..."
"But when did it happen? Right up to that moment, he was his usual self, joking and smiling. What if there was something I could have done? Something to save him..."
"But when did it happen? Right up to that moment, he was his usual self, joking and smiling. What if there was something I could have done? Something to save him..."
"But when did it happen? Right up to that moment, he was his usual self, joking and smiling. What if there was something I could've done? Something to save him..."
"But when did it happen? Right up to that moment, he was his usual self, joking and smiling. What if there was something I could've done? Something to save him..."

languages.text: «Pero ¿cuándo ocurrió? Hasta ese mismo momento, seguía siendo él mismo, con sus bromas y su sonrisa. ¿No había nada que pudiera hacer? ¿Alguna forma de salvarle?...».
languages.original_text: "But when did it happen? Right up to that moment, he was his usual self, joking and smiling. What if there was something I could've done? Something to save him..."

traits.locale_text: «Pero ¿cuándo ocurrió? Hasta ese mismo momento, seguía siendo él mismo, con sus bromas y su sonrisa. ¿No había nada que pudiera hacer? ¿Alguna forma de salvarle?...».

languages.text: 「でも、毒されたなんて、いつ…？あの瞬間まで、彼はいつものように冗談を言って笑っていたのに。もし、できることがあったなら？彼を救える何かできることが…」
languages.original_text: "But when did it happen? Right up to that moment, he was his usual self, joking and smiling. What if there was something I could've done? Something to save him..."

traits.locale_text: 「でも、毒されたなんて、いつ…？あの瞬間まで、彼はいつものように冗談を言って笑っていたのに。もし、できることがあったなら？彼を救える何かできることが…」

languages.text: “但这一切是什么时候发生的？直到刚才为止，他还是他平常的样子，谈笑风生。如果我能早点做些什么呢？如果我能早点救他的话……”
languages.original_text: "But when did it happen? Right up to that moment, he was his usual self, joking and smiling. What if there was something I could've done? Something to save him..."

traits.locale_text: “但这一切是什么时候发生的？直到刚才为止，他还是他平常的样子，谈笑风生。如果我能早点做些什么呢？如果我能早点救他的话……”

languages.text: "Doch wann ist das geschehen? Bis zu diesem Augenblick war er wie immer, hat gewitzelt und gegrinst. Vielleicht hätte ich irgendetwas tun können? Ihn irgendwie retten können ..."
languages.original_text: "But when did it happen? Right up to that moment, he was his usual self, joking and smiling. What if there was something I could've done? Something to save him..."

traits.locale_text: "Doch wann ist das geschehen? Bis zu diesem Augenblick war er wie immer, hat gewitzelt und gegrinst. Vielleicht hätte ich irgendetwas tun können? Ihn irgendwie retten können ..."

languages.text: « Mais quand est-ce que ça a bien pu arriver ? Jusqu'à l'instant où il s'en est pris à moi, il était fidèle à lui-même, souriant, blagueur... Et si j'avais pu faire quelque chose ? Quelque chose pour le sauver... »
languages.original_text: "But when did it happen? Right up to that moment, he was his usual self, joking and smiling. What if there was something I could've done? Something to save him..."

traits.locale_text: « Mais quand est-ce que ça a bien pu arriver ? Jusqu'à l'instant où il s'en est pris à moi, il était fidèle à lui-même, souriant, blagueur... Et si j'avais pu faire quelque chose ? Quelque chose pour le sauver... »

languages.text: "Bu ne zaman oldu ki? O ana dek kendi gibiydi, şakalaşıp gülüyordu. Ya yapabileceğim bir şey vardı da kaçırdıysam? Onu kurtarmanın bir yolu..."
languages.original_text: "But when did it happen? Right up to that moment, he was his usual self, joking and smiling. What if there was something I could've done? Something to save him..."
